import { useState } from 'react'; import './App.css'; function App() { const [showGameScreen, setShowGameScreen] = useState(false) return (
WHWG
Welcome to the World's Hardest Word Game
You will receive a 3-letter prompt picked from a random word in the dictionary
You will have ten seconds to type a word which contains the prompt
But NOT at the very beginning or very end
For example, for the prompt "ice":
iceberg tricep practice
); } export default App;
